text: Harvey Robert Levin (born September 2, 1950) is an American military veteran, television producer, lawyer, legal analyst and celebrity reporter of Jewish descent. He is the founder of TMZ and also the host of OBJECTified, which airs on the Fox News Channel. In April 2010, Levin publicly came out as gay. He has been in a partnership with Andy Mauer since the 1990s. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Variety profile Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:Lawyers from Los Angeles Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American television presenters Category:American television producers Category:Businesspeople from Los Angeles Category:Fox News people Category:Gay Jews Category:Jewish American actors Category:Jewish American writers Category:Jewish businesspeople Category:Jewish lawyers Category:LGBT actors Category:LGBT lawyers Category:LGBT people from Los Angeles Category:American LGBT writers Category:Television personalities from Los Angeles Category:Writers from Los Angeles
title: Harvey Levin
